00384     class _OgreExport HardwareBufferManager : public HardwareBufferManagerBase, public Singleton<HardwareBufferManager>
00385     {

00399             return mImpl->createVertexBuffer(vertexSize, numVerts, usage, useShadowBuffer);
00400         }
